review: Google does it again! Great product!
author: Christian

review: You gotta get one! My kids LOVE casting from the phone, their Chromebooks...it's so fun.
author: Amazon Customer "beanth"

review: impossible to set up. can't use my laptop - it's too old of a system. can't use my kindle. worked with my iphone yesterday but not today. I thought this was a plug it in and go. it is not. not pleased at all
author: Christine

review: Easy to set up and works great
author: Caitlin MacIntire

review: This thing is good..  Work really good with my tablet and cellphone.
author: vianney pena

review: It died soon after the 1 year warranty ended. This is not comparable with apple TV by any means. As for its functionality, it is not really compatible with much.
author: Pen

review: I own three already, and I love all of them. They just need to get out of the beta phase. Also amazon needs to make prime, and instant video chromecast compatible without having to cast the videos.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazing device. Google is the best and the Chromecast proves it.
author: Gerardo Lerena
